lines.text: My boy, you must first return everything you have stolen.
You have suggested my intensions... precisely!
When you 'ave done this, then come to me. I will always be your friend.
God... I can't stand it! The pain! The pain!
London's Limehouse District - with its lust, greed, and love... a sea of fog; a stream of human faces.
We're brothers all... my friends. Bear no ill will... life is what we make it.
Doing a bit of slumming... would like to see your show.
Want me to tell your Dad you're with a Chink?
[Young lady starts to cry]
Go 'ome and get that paint off your face!
[Kicks young lady in her behind as she leaves the vaudeville theater]
You're so bloomin' pretty you needs somthin' to protect you; a gun... or somebody.
Do you like that?
[Referring to a diamond choker]
I'll get you one just like it!
Pouf! Where you get the money?
I say... we are going down Plum Alley to see the Chinkies smoking.
I say... shall we go?
Frenchy, 'e's waitin' in the bar for you.
I didn't shoot him! I take an oath... I didn't shoot him! Someone told the coppers! They came to my flat! I was escaping... a shot was fired -...
Now I know you... you dirty coppers' nark!
But I'll fool 'em! I can't let 'em get me... I'll fool 'em!
I'm foolin' 'em... I'm foolin' 'em... I'm foolin' 'em -...

[to Fifi]
The Blackbird's fair balmy over you... 'e sent you a present.
